title: Hoong Woh Tong
description: Shop sells a vegetarian version of guilinggao (龜苓膏), a traditional Chinese herbal jelly which requires boiling turtle shells for hours and is marketed as being good for detoxing and improving skin complexion. This shop claims to be all vegetarian, using herbs as a substitute. It also sells 24 herbs drink (廿四味) and 5 flowers tea (五花茶) among other herbal drinks.
